caption.p: The Inflammatory and Immune Thrombosis Related Mechanisms.

graphic.alt-text: Illustration of the inflammation and immune mechanism showing SARS-CoV-2 viral particles interacting with cell surface receptors. It depicts cytokine storm, complement activation (lectin, classical, alternative pathways), and neutrophil recruitment. Inflammatory mediators like IL-1β, IL-18, and others are shown, along with platelet activation and the formation of membrane attack complexes.
